code: import React from'react';import'../css/SpacecraftsList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SpacecraftList=_ref=>{let{pictureUrl,name,capacity,id,showSpaceshipDetails,destroySpacecraft}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:()=>showSpaceshipDetails(id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"".concat(pictureUrl),alt:"spacecraft",className:"img"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"info",children:["Name: ","".concat(name)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"info",children:["Capacity: ","".concat(capacity)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>destroySpacecraft(id),children:"Destroy"})]});};export default SpacecraftList;
